column5: The new board looks good Rick, thanks for taking the time to set it all up.  Only problem I have so far is when I'm scrolling thru a post it's extremely jerky and almost impossible to keep track of where I am. It's hard to explain but when I'm reading a post and scrolling down it's almost like all the text is flipping over each other, almost as if you were trying to read something thru wavy water........if that makes any sense.  On the main page though, when reading down the list of forum topics, everything scrolls very smoothly.  Any thoughts ??  EDIT++++  OK, something I just realised is that this problem only happens when I'm logged in. When I log out it doesn't happen and the pages scroll very smoothly.  Wierd stuff
looks messy in netscape 4.5  and  ie 5.5

Awesome job Rick! I really like the new look. I am browsing with Google Chrome and have no issues. This board version seems quite a bit faster than the old one.  Keep up the great work and tell TJ that you want a raise and not his eyebrow!

I'm noticing that some replies get dropped right tp the very bottom of the page leaving a huge blank space tween the last post and latest reply.  My reply to last walleye trip. Dr S's reply to perchin.
Where is the picture gallery now located?

Maybe my favourite new feature is if you click on a topic you have previously opened the topic opens at the first new post after you last opened the topic. I know what I mean, but I'm not sure I expressed it very well.  I Like it though!
LMAO!! Are you running Commodore 64?
As we stated before the conversion, the gallery is now on it's own site. I forget the URL though.,,lol,
VIC20  pls don't hate.
Do you know my in-laws? They still have a rotary phone mounted on the wall, and they were still paying a rental fee for it until recently. 30 years rental = Most expensive phone in the world.

Great job on the new upgrade.  It's so good that it makes my fish look bigger, even out of water!  Thank you for all of the hard work and dedication.  Lots of work and sleepless nights.  Definitely appreciated.
Uhmmm what is with the advert bot? Spam in our threads? is this by design?????  G

Keep it up guys!  No complaints on this end. Well not until another month or 2!  Just like anything, everything has it's quirks, surely the geeky guys with glasses will get them all hammered down.  Cheers, Ron...

New Problem - When I'm holding my beer in my right hand, I hit my down button and it goes all the way to the bottom of the page instead of scrolling down. Is this normal?  The problem is not in the consumption of beer!
Try drinking with your left hand..
What's this thing about setting my status?
Wow so crisp and clean looking. Makes my monitor look like its bigger somehow.  More space !!  Great Job !!  DSN
Yeah what's the status thing about...
OK, so from what I gather, my question was answered before this ask a question thread was started.
I have a request!!! If we have to look at the spam bot anyway, can you at least give the spambot a decent avatar? I'm thinkin' Billy Mays or Vince The Sham Wow Guy!!!!!
We were actually going to make them an avatar and pic. I think the slap Chop guy (you're gonna love my nuts) and Billy Mays are registered trade marks, tho
We can see yours, Rich. You can't see your own cause it is assumed you are already your own friend
Maintaining more than two skins is too time consuming. We also were looking for a branded look and this skin was best suited for that.
Yeah - I updated my original post - assumed that was it.    So - there is such as thing as a "STOOPID QUESTION".  I just proved it.
Give me a screenshot and your browser version Wayne. Nothing on this site will work in IE6, btw.
can we still download our old PMs I would like to delete a bunch but would like to save them to my puter first
Yes you can...go to the top right of the screen, click on your name, then click on messenger, then download to your heart's content.
Sorry if this is obvious, but can you still view "new since last visit"? I was just getting used to that. Jim
Jim, top of the page at the right it says "view new content", is that what you want?

My profile pic is a little wide and all of the information that use to be on the right hand side is now on the left overlapping my personal pic.... Is there a way to have it on the right hand side or do I have to resize my personal pic in my profile.  Thanks!!!
Had to make this post just to see where mine went.

that's not what I meant or I don't see it on the IP.board skin  I can see and read my messages  but I want to save them to my computer as an excel file before I delete them, like I could do 3 days ago

Other than a few red X's here and there I have only found one annoying thing so far. That is when I read a post and hit my back button to go back to the previous menu I get a web page expired warning and have to refresh and click on another warning to get back to the page.
That's doing the same thing to me so i will look at that. I get a 'resend information' advisory. Probably a session setting but may also be a security feature.
Is the calender tab at the top right of the screen a public calender where all members events will be visible (such as: G2Gs) or is it our own private calender(such as: buy condoms)?
nomad found himself??? might have to change your handle now   for some reason my "Chief Administrator" capabilities are not working at all ....
lol Just added "Kickingfrog: Need to buy condoms" on the 23rd. You can choose either personal or public. The public ones have to be approved. Sorry Mods
Didn't take long to fix it.
Just had to set the cookie domain
so far so good hope to have some time to get used to the new stuff
It wasn't in the past... I as well as MANY other used that skin... I do not understand why it was ok then but not now?... is it something that can be looked at?

Sorry Gerritt, but it was too much before..doing seven edits for each change was a PITA. The Club Skin was by far the most popular, was cached in Google for us and was available in this coding. As far as the future goes..who knows?
Wow!! Looks pretty sharp. Being as I am not so computer literate, this might take a little while to figure out.  Where is the machine that goes "Ping"?
my selecteric just xxxx the bed seeing the new site...
Is anyone else having issues with page load times?  On the old forum and every other web site I peruse, no issues. But this new forum takes on average 15 to 20 seconds for every page load.....

I'm way faster Spiel. Ranging from 0.08 to 0.20 seconds. Update your IE or try another browser and see what happens. We are using the newest AJAX coding so older browsers will suffer. IE6 won't work at all, but it has been dropped by Microsoft into the archives. Early versions of IE7 may have a few issues too. The only way to know what the issue is, is to do something different and see what happens.
And we will answer what we know about the new digs. Thanks again Rick for the great job.
dang and we are back
Hey Roy, did our pics get saved? If so, where?
could you change the font color for the members list .. hard to read the black on green
Well done and thank you!
good job guys...
Are the emoticon's going to be updated as well?
Yup.. its on the list.
I notice views count are not working on post after the upgrade was done  edit

its all weird and scary... yet... a happy site to see and have back... ya know, while we were offline... i did some things im not really proud of... family time, shopping with the wife... spring cleaning.... *shudders*
Viewcounts are delayed to save server resources. They come up in awhile.
Can I have a manual

Just when I was getting a lot of work done..  In profile... Topics/posts etc is layered overtop of stuff. Also post count in profile doesn't match thread post count (suppose that is from manual overide at last board change).  Edit doesn't work in IP Skin either..
Good work guys. I kinda miss the old one  But this is nice and clean cut.I was jogging around a few others and its not as good as this one. Fish on and cheers
Great looking site, way to go guys!!
All the pages are dynamically sized now. If you reduce/increase the page size by holding CTRL while scrolling with mouse wheel, you will find the page size that matches your resolution and screen.
Still stays layered over picture etc... no matter how small you make it.  Take your sweetheart for a walk... all this crap can wait..
Seems to work well guys. Nice upgrade.
Wow! Very nice looking. Everything seems to work on my screen... Good job! Garry2R's
What happened to the pictures that were PM'd to me?

Question:  In the posts, many of the members have an ICON to ADD AS FRIEND and SEND PM.   How do you get them to appear ?  NEVERMIND:  I guess I wouldn't send myself a PM nor would I even ask myself to be one of my own friends.  I doubt they would show on your own profile.  (do ya have an icon for an idiot ?
can we have our old skins back? I am really not fond of the default skin.. and the other available skin is horrible..  ?  G
Love the looks of the chat feature!

Problem encountered:   In a thread, I click on the little green ICON to view a profile.   With the profile displayed, I did a right-click and select properties of this window.  Once I do this, IE-7 locks up and I have to user the task manager to end the session.
Yeah IE7 locks up alot..lol  The pages are all dynamic and as such trying to get properties will get nothing.
